body.p:
INDIANA STATE SEAL
STATE OF INDIANA
Executive Department.
Indianapolis June 5 1863
Governor,

I write you at the request of some friends of Major Jno. W. Jordan who is now engaged in organizing a regiment of Kentucky Vols. at Covington Ky. He was Major of the 57th Inda for over a year, and is a good drill officer as well as an excellent disciplinarian, and was very popular in the regiment, they having made him a valuable present just previous to his resignation

I have the honor to be
Very Respectfully
over
Your Obt Servt
O, P, Morton,
Gov, of Indiana

Ex. Dept Indianapolis
June 5th/63
Morton O. P.
Gov. Ind.
